mapper.select: SELECT * FROM supplies ORDER BY id

SELECT b.*, s.name, s.category, s.total_quantity, s.available_quantity, s.description, s.is_available, e.name as emp_name, d.name as dept_name FROM supplies_booking b JOIN supplies s ON b.supply_id = s.id LEFT JOIN employees e ON b.emp_num = e.emp_num LEFT JOIN departments d ON e.dep_id = d.id WHERE b.booking_status != 'CANCELLED' ORDER BY b.start DESC

SELECT b.*, s.name, s.category, s.total_quantity, s.available_quantity, s.description, s.is_available, e.name as emp_name, d.name as dept_name FROM supplies_booking b JOIN supplies s ON b.supply_id = s.id LEFT JOIN employees e ON b.emp_num = e.emp_num LEFT JOIN departments d ON e.dep_id = d.id WHERE b.emp_num = #{empNum} AND b.booking_status != 'CANCELLED' ORDER BY b.start DESC

SELECT b.*, s.name, s.category, s.total_quantity, s.available_quantity, s.description, s.is_available, e.name as emp_name, d.name as dept_name FROM supplies_booking b JOIN supplies s ON b.supply_id = s.id LEFT JOIN employees e ON b.emp_num = e.emp_num LEFT JOIN departments d ON e.dep_id = d.id WHERE b.supply_id = #{supplyId} AND b.booking_status != 'CANCELLED' ORDER BY b.start DESC

SELECT b.*, s.name, s.category, s.total_quantity, s.available_quantity, s.description, s.is_available, e.name as emp_name, d.name as dept_name FROM supplies_booking b JOIN supplies s ON b.supply_id = s.id LEFT JOIN employees e ON b.emp_num = e.emp_num LEFT JOIN departments d ON e.dep_id = d.id WHERE b.booking_status != 'CANCELLED' AND ((b.start BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate}) OR (b.end BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate}) OR (b.start <= #{startDate} AND b.end >= #{endDate})) ORDER BY b.start
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO supplies_booking (supply_id, emp_num, quantity, start, end, purpose, booking_status) VALUES (#{supplyId}, #{empNum}, #{quantity}, #{start}, #{end}, #{purpose}, #{bookingStatus})
mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN ( (SELECT total_quantity FROM supplies WHERE id = #{supplyId}) >= (#{quantity} + (SELECT COALESCE(MAX(booked_qty), 0) FROM ( SELECT SUM(quantity) as booked_qty FROM supplies_booking WHERE supply_id = #{supplyId} AND booking_status != 'CANCELLED' AND (id != #{excludeBookingId} OR #{excludeBookingId} IS NULL) AND ( (start <= #{endTime} AND end >= #{startTime}) ) GROUP BY supply_id ) as bookings_per_time)) THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END

WITH time_slots AS ( SELECT sb.start as time_point FROM supplies_booking sb WHERE sb.supply_id = #{supplyId} AND sb.booking_status != 'CANCELLED' AND (sb.id != #{excludeBookingId} OR #{excludeBookingId} IS NULL) AND (sb.start BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime})
UNION
SELECT sb.end as time_point FROM supplies_booking sb WHERE sb.supply_id = #{supplyId} AND sb.booking_status != 'CANCELLED' AND (sb.id != #{excludeBookingId} OR #{excludeBookingId} IS NULL) AND (sb.end BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}) ), quantities_at_times AS ( SELECT ts.time_point, COALESCE(SUM(sb.quantity), 0) as total_booked FROM time_slots ts LEFT JOIN supplies_booking sb ON sb.supply_id = #{supplyId} AND sb.booking_status != 'CANCELLED' AND (sb.id != #{excludeBookingId} OR #{excludeBookingId} IS NULL) AND ts.time_point BETWEEN sb.start AND sb.end GROUP BY ts.time_point ) SELECT COALESCE(MAX(total_booked), 0) as max_booked_quantity FROM quantities_at_times
